about_the_game:
This is a demo of the game Mystery of Gévaudan from a solo developer, inspired by French legends as well as games like Penumbra and Amnesia: The Dark Descent.

In this demo you will be able to appreciate the second level of the game, as well as a small modified part of the first level. You will be able to evaluate the basic mechanics of the game, evaluate the visual part of the game, and also learn some of the in-game lore. In the main menu you will find a feedback button, by clicking on which you will be able to influence the development in a positive way.

Enjoy the game!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains blood and gore, scenes of violence, jump scare triggers, scary images, strong language and intense sounds that may not be suitable for children and players with certain medical conditions.
Due to flashing lights this game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy.
Discretion is advised.

detailed_description:
This is a demo of the game Mystery of Gévaudan from a solo developer, inspired by French legends as well as games like Penumbra and Amnesia: The Dark Descent.

In this demo you will be able to appreciate the second level of the game, as well as a small modified part of the first level. You will be able to evaluate the basic mechanics of the game, evaluate the visual part of the game, and also learn some of the in-game lore. In the main menu you will find a feedback button, by clicking on which you will be able to influence the development in a positive way.

Enjoy the game!
name: Mystery of Gevaudan Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7300HQ CPU @ 2.50GHz 2.50 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 2 GB or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7300HQ CPU @ 2.50GHz 2.50 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This is a demo of the game Mystery of Gévaudan, inspired by French legends which enables you to try a small portion of the full game, test game mechanics and give yourself a foretaste of it's atmosphere and story
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian
*languages with full audio support
